definition: to jump the gun/to make a false start
to fight over/to rush/to scramble/to grab/to rob/to snatch
to run/to run away/to escape/to run around (on errands etc)/(of a gas or liquid) to leak or evaporate/(verb complement) away/off

sentences.english: Breaking into the palaces, they snatched everything of value.
sentences.chinese: 他們闖進皇宮，把值錢的東西都搶跑了。

sentences.english: The runners called back because one of them beat the pistol.
sentences.chinese: 賽跑運動員們被叫回來，殷爲他們中有一人搶跑了。

sentences.english: When he unexpectedly false started, he had the stadium audibly chuckling.
sentences.chinese: 當他出人意料地搶跑時，整個體育場都笑出聲來。

sentences.english: In the 100-meter dash he jumped the gun several times because of nervousness.
sentences.chinese: 在100米賽跑中他因爲緊張搶跑了好幾次。
